text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yukino? What's got you up so early? 
… Your vibe's waaay different today.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Ms. Curren… I apologize for the silly things I said yesterday!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
I'll do it! I'll dance right in the spotlight and give it my all! 
But I know I'm not up to it right now ——

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: So please!! Teach me how ta dance better!!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
…… Hehehe. Sure, I can help♪ 
I know your part of the dance too ——

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: And I'll teach you the "cutest" ways to captivate the audience!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Ms. Curren! I'll give it every bit I've got…!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
…… Interesting. I guess you do have it in you. 
The primal instinct ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Brian, let yourself enjoy the moment. In this festival, in the Festival of Illustrious Equines… and in our Yabusame.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: That's all I ask.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Hmph… I've been itching to break free from 
playing with arrows and longing to really run.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
(I'm done being a restless beast in a cage. 
It's time to bare my fangs.)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: No problem… I'll follow your advice and enjoy myself, alright. Exactly as my instincts dictate.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh, Brian. Here for the morning bath? It is our last day of camp, unfortunately ——

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I'm here to talk to you. Figured you'd come here 
to wake up, and it looks like I was right.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haha…… we're here with non-council students, so I would 
appreciate if you could consider my image. Let's keep quiet 
about my waking troubles, shall we?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— So, what's on your mind, Brian?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: The Yabusame.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
That watered-down version we perform now is just boring. 
Even the audience must be craving something more exciting.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Why not revert to the "traditional form", huh, Emperor?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …… Oh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You said it yourself, didn't you? The original Yabusame was a challenging ritual deep in the sacred mountains.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Running and leaping unaided through the mountain's 
untouched wilds, piercing countless targets.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Two archers competing as they rush to reach 
the mountaintop before the watch fires dies out.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You boldly promised the chairwoman, didn't you? To make 
this Festival of Illustrious Equines "more thrilling than ever".

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You're suggesting the original form is superior, both in 
novelty and entertainment? ……Heheh, I must admit 
your argument certainly holds water.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: This is not like you at all.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …… What?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, you've made your point, Brian. 
I have only one question left.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Will this truly bring you joy?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hah.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Needless to ask. ……Face me in a showdown, "Emperor". With our goddesses watching. Surely they would prefer a spirited battle too.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'll follow my instincts and go head-to-head with you!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Bloodthirsty and lionhearted — now that's more like you, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Challenge accepted. Let us hash out the details immediately. 
And given we have the opportunity… where better to continue 
our discussion than in the sauna?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Looking for a pre-bout test of endurance, are we?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hahah! With you, Brian, that's not a bad idea at all!
